items.sentence: Tom drove into town to get a new part for his broken down tractor.
Tom dug a hole in his backyard with the shovel Mary had given him.
Tom made a reservation at a fancy restaurant for Valentine\'s day.
If I\'d known that Tom was in the hospital, I\'d have visited him.
Tom thought it wouldn\'t be safe for Mary to walk home by herself.
Tell Tom that I\'m hanging up the laundry and I\'ll call him back.
We\'re not exactly friends, but we\'re not exactly enemies either.
Tom told Mary that she put up her Christmas decorations too early.
I have almost three more hours before I have to be at the airport.
I knew there would be trouble as soon as Tom walked into the room.
